paragraphs.text: Thanks Omer! I agree, entrepreneurship is no trick. It’s diligently working harder than anyone else over an extended period of time. There is a lot to overcome and it isn’t just a ‘wave of the hand’ to solve most problems.
paragraphs.name: 650f

paragraphs.text: Thanks Jason! I’m a sucker for magic! 🎩

65c9b9dc1c9b.title: An inspiring call to action to start off the day… “aim for magic.”

paragraphs.text: An inspiring call to action to start off the day… “aim for magic.” I especially loved the Houdini story , to lean on that glass until it cracks. The key to swinging that door open was persistence (in his case to the point of exhaustion); that was the real magic that even Houdini himself may have failed to realize… just when we’re about to give up, the real magic happens…
paragraphs.name: ed03

84a1fbff987.title: I really enjoyed reading this Peter.

paragraphs.text: I really enjoyed reading this Peter. I was skeptical when I first read the title because it’s a slog and there are no magic tricks, just lots of hard work. But you compared entrepreneurs to magicians very elegantly. You highlighted the purpose, supported by the hard work behind the scenes … and that’s very powerful. Thank you. Omer
